channel.title: Macos 26 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Macos 26 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: iOS 26, iPadOS 26, macOS 26 Tahoe, and Apple’s other OS updates launch September 15
item.description: If your device is supported, it’s getting Liquid Glass-ier later this month.

item.title: Six lesser-known features to like in the macOS 26 Tahoe public beta
item.description: Here are some things you can kick the tires on if you install the public beta.

item.title: Apple Intelligence news summaries are back, with a big red disclaimer
item.description: Apple disabled news summaries earlier this year after they mangled headlines.

item.title: Apple sues YouTuber who leaked iOS 26’s new “Liquid Glass” software redesign
item.description: YouTuber claims to “have receipts” disproving Apple’s allegations.
